title: Crackme assistance - unknown function [closed]
content:
i have a problem about a crackme that my friend sent me for a bet. I solved most of it but i am stuck with this function. I can't even understand what the function is trying to do. Please help.

images related to my problem: https://i.sstatic.net/sjhVN.jpg

comments.text: Really, you should post more detail
what else should i add please say something
I think the most helpful way is to send the binary

Hello there you go this is the file, it might have a virus by the way so be careful,btw file changed a bit my friend send me a second one after i couldn't make the first one(and im dxAhax) easyupload.io/1qb31x
No, i think its a lol loader can you do something ? I didn't have enough information for reverse engineering.

answers_data.content: This doesn't appear to be a crackme, 27MB is quite large and the strings seem to indicate that this is possibly related to League of Legends.
